data.title: 21 Best Computer Programming Courses To Get a Job in 2024
data.meta_description: A programming career can be lucrative in 2024. If you don’t know which computer coding course to choose, here is a list of 21 top computer programming courses.
data.text:
Computer programming is always evolving. 20 years ago, no computer science students would have imagined machine learning to progress so far that it would be present in the homes of common people. But for the last 5 years, machine learning has become a hot topic in the tech world and many people are employing data scientists and machine learning researchers to build and secure their systems.

You can also check out our free courses offered by upGrad in Management, Data Science, Machine Learning, Digital Marketing, and Technology.

There are many job roles available in the computer programming industry such as Computer Programming Analyst, Full Stack Developer, Dotnet Developer, PHP Developer, etc. Depending on the interest one choose to create a niche for themselves to pursue a career. The computer programmers make sure that the computer applications and the software work properly. They perform many tasks but majorly they write and test the code and scripts. And wherever there is any modification needed, they modify the codes as well to achieve the end results.

Learners receive an average Salary hike of 58% with the highest being up to 400%.

With the evolution of computer programming languages, it is clear that there will be certain computer programming languages that go obsolete in modern times. New programming languages replace them and it would be beneficial for students to take up online programming courses and learn programming online to truly flourish in the tech world.

There are certain hard skills required to be a computer programmer such as the knowledge of data structures, SQL, Web Development, Cloud Computing, OOPs languages, etc. There are many online programming courses to upskill oneself in order to excel in the domain.

Meanwhile, check out our HRM Advanced certification course.

Here are some of the top computer programming courses that are ruling the current tech industry and which students should try to go for if they wish to learn programming online:

Top Computer Programming Courses to get a High Paying Job

1. Python

If you are looking for the most popular computer science course, this is the right one for you. This coding course ranks number 1 in the computer programming courses list.

Python is one of the top computer programming courses in India & a computer language that is quite popular these days since it has machine learning elements integrated with it. Python developer salary in India can summarise the situation for you. A course in Python would teach you the basics of Python and how you can use it to do your basic coding. If you are someone who has a moderate knowledge of computers, coding, and programming, then you will easily get a hang of Python and learn to program online.

Python is a very in-demand hard skill in the computer programming industry. Its market is projected to reach USD 100.6 Million in 2030 showing a CAGR of 44.8%. (Source). The reason why Python is in demand is because of its applicability in each area, from web development to data science and machine learning. It is useful in evry domain, as it not only eases out the tasks but having this skill opens many career options and job opportunities. In today’s time, there is no limit to educating oneself as there are many options to learn programming online.

These courses typically cover Python basics, data structures, algorithms, web development frameworks (like Django and Flask), and modules focused on machine learning and AI. Hands-on projects and practical applications are often integrated into these courses, enabling students to gain practical experience and real-world problem-solving skills.

For individuals interested in pursuing a career in technology or enhancing their programming expertise, this is one of the best coding courses in India. There are numerous institutes both online and offline that provide this course. All in all, it is a coding course that can offer an excellent gateway due to the language’s wide applicability and increasing demand across various industries.

2. R and Software Development

A computer science course in R and software development is highly sought-after. It ranks quite high in the computer language courses list because of the diverse career opportunities it may offer. Individuals can explore roles in data analysis, statistical modeling, software engineering, data science, research, academia, and specialized fields where data-driven decision-making is crucial.

The R language is a special language that is quite useful in data science. R Language helps you to handle complex data, build packages and customize your own data visualizations. In most online programming courses regarding R, you will learn about R, the development practices used for building these tools and how to make R work in team-based settings.

R is a very useful language for many reasons such as –

It can be used by everyone as it is an open programming language.

The effective analysation of the data.

Codes from R can be used on different platforms such as Unix, Linux, Windows, etc.

Easier and clearer to use tools.

Can be used in machine learning, plot graphs, histograms, etc.

Useful for heavy statistical computing and programming.

Having the knowledge of R opens many doors for higher positions and is better for a good career progression. There are many online programming courses that one can pursue to upskill themselves.

This is regarded as the best course for computer science students often involve hands-on projects, real-world case studies, and collaborations, providing learners with practical experience and a comprehensive understanding of both R and software development paradigms.

3. Fundamentals of Java Programming

If you had taken computers in your school, then you probably know a bit about Java. Java is always one of the top computer programming courses in India program and it is quite a basic program that helps students get a glimpse of the complex world of programming. With online computer programming courses in Java, you should be able to develop foundational skills required for any software engineer which include solving real-world problems, designing different algorithms, and debugging.

It is the most used programming language.

This course is also heralded as the best course for computer science students. Projects and assignments in these courses allow students to apply their knowledge and skills to real-world scenarios, reinforcing their understanding of Java programming concepts.

Given Java’s widespread use in the industry, mastering it with a computer science course specializing in Java provides students with a strong foundation to embark on a career in software development, application programming, enterprise software, mobile app development (Android), and other tech-related fields.

Source

There are various reasons behind Java’s popularity. Its ability to be platform-independent and object-oriented is one of the main reasons why it is widely used. There are many hard skills that are a prerequisite for Java Developer such as the knowledge of OOPs, Spring Boot, APIs, Software Design, DevOps, JUnit, etc.

Looking to boost your job prospects in the tech industry? Discover the best online computer courses for job readiness and elevate your skills to meet the demands of today’s digital workforce.

4. Web Development or Full Stack Developer

If you are wondering which course is best for software job, this should be leading the software programming courses list

The demand for Full Stack Developer is on the rise in the current world. A full stack developer is an individual who works both back-end and front-end for web development or app development. A course to become a Full Stack Developer would involve learning of HTML, JavaScript, CSS, Python, MySQL and so much more.

Compared to some other specialized fields in software development, web development allows for a quicker entry into the job market. The nature of web development often requires a more practical, hands-on approach rather than extensive theoretical knowledge, enabling individuals to start working sooner. This is what makes this one of the easy software courses to get a job.

Bureau of Labour Statistics (BLS) has reported that CAGR will grow to 13% by 2026. (Source) A full-stack developer is expected to have knowledge of both backend and front-end development. They should be equipped with the understanding of these to take the task forward efficiently. So to do the same, there are a set of hard skills which are required for a full stack developer. Some of the hard skills are-

HTML, CSS, etc.

JavaScript

PHP

Python

Git

SQL

Web Architecture

MongoDB

ReactJS

NodeJS

MernStack

Also, check out our DevOps certification course to upskill yourself.

5. Google Cloud Platform Architecture

Online programming courses related to Google Cloud are more related to the deployment of solution-based elements like solutions based on infrastructure elements like application services, networks, etc. It helps in the deploying of practical solutions which involve encryption keys, access management, etc.

The global Google Cloud market is expected to grow to USD 947.3 billion by 202, with a CAGR to grow at a rate of 16.3% (Source). The hard skills which are often required for a cloud architect are:

Java

Python

AWS

Data Storage

Visualisation

DevOps

Programming Skills

Data Skills

If you play your cards right, this course can also be the best course for software job especially in roles that involve cloud computing, software development, or DevOps. As more businesses migrate their infrastructure and applications to the cloud, the demand for professionals skilled in cloud architecture and services is skyrocketing. Understanding Google Cloud Platform (GCP) or any other cloud provider’s architecture is increasingly essential for modern software development.

6. JavaScript

JavaScript courses are highly pursued with many renowned institutions offering the best coding courses in India. It ranks quite high in the programming courses list due to its integral role in web development. It is an indispensable skill to have especially for aspiring developers seeking to create engaging user experiences and robust web applications.

If you do not want to be a Full Stack Web developer, but still want to work on web development, then you may have to start off with JavaScript. It is important to know how JavaScript works and understand the fundamental concepts behind JavaScript.

The course will teach you what are closures, IIFEs, Prototypal inheritances, etc. It will also help you to debug your project from your own home. You will be able to understand the source code of frameworks in JavaScript and build your own JavaScript library or framework.

JavaScript is known to be gaining popularity among professionals. There are certain hard skills which are required for its better implementation and some of them are mentioned below-

Asynchronous programming

JavaScript Instantiation Patterns

Functional Programming

Cross-Browser Coding

Also, visit upGrad’s Degree Counselling page for all undergraduate and postgraduate programs.

7. Angular 6

If you want to amp up your game and build reactive and amazing web applications, then you have to master Angular 6. Angular 6 is a successor of the once-popular Angular.js and it will help you understand directives, components, routings, HTTP access, etc.

The high scalability of the framework of Angular 6 is the reason behind its high demand. It is a Javascript framework used to develop web applications. It has built-in features of animations and https. It builds very smooth and highly testable websites and applications. It also makes use of its features and helps to dissolve any leakages by debugging. The growth for Angular Developers is predicted to grow by 31% by the year 2026.

Regarded as one of the best course for computer science students, this course in Angular 6 offers the opportunity to acquire in-demand skills, capitalize on the framework’s features, and align oneself with the growing demand for proficient Angular developers in the job market.

Enrolling in a course for Angular 6 allows developers to learn the framework’s core concepts, best practices, and advanced features. As technology evolves, continuous learning and staying updated with the latest versions of Angular can ensure sustained career growth and relevance.

8. Redux and React

Redux and React are two major areas that any app developer should put emphasis on. If you are someone who wants to make your own app or want to work for a company and build an app, then make Redux and React your friends.

After going for a course in React and Redux, you can learn how to develop different apps which get support from Webpack, ES6, and NPM. It will help you understand the core behind how React components are built and the different structure-based applications of Redux.

Redux is basically used to maintain the state of an application. Because of the ability of the state management of the application, it is useful in optimising the performance of the application.

Whereas, React is used to create interactive applications for various platforms such as mobile, and web development. React also helps in creating composable user-friendly interfaces. This feature helps in creating reusable UI components and interfaces. It is a very powerful JavaScript library.

These are some of the easy software courses to get a job. Courses in Redux and React are often considered valuable and potentially easier paths to secure a job in software development. eact and Redux skills are in high demand in the job market. Having a portfolio or demonstrating proficiency in these technologies can give job seekers a competitive edge in landing roles as front-end developers, UI/UX designers, or full-stack developers.

Moreover, both React and Redux are continually evolving with updates and improvements. Engaging in a course ensures that individuals learn the latest best practices and features, keeping their skills relevant in a fast-paced tech landscape.

9. Android N Developer

Are you someone who loves to see the new apps popping up in Google Play feeds? Do you want to learn to develop such an app on your own? Then, you can start your journey by learning how to build an app with Android 7 Nougat. By learning app development in Android, you can develop your own Android apps like WhatsApp and Uber. In online programming courses on Android App development, you will also learn how you can market your app easily on the internet.

There is an extremely high demand for android developers in the market. It has not seen any dip. For the same reason, the android developers are paid good remuneration for their skills. The demand is not only at the experienced level but at the entry-level as well.

Learning Android N development through structured software programming courses provides a solid foundation for building Android apps, covering topics such as UI design, layouts, intents, data storage, APIs, notifications, and more. By acquiring skills in Android N development, individuals position themselves well to capitalize on the vast opportunities within the mobile app development industry.

The developers build applications for the Android platforms. In order to build a smooth application, the developers are well versed with testing functions that help in debugging the applications. The developers are also well acquainted with the designing and maintaining of the applications.

10. iOS 11 and Swift Developer

Most people know that Android and iOS use different mechanisms and hence, they have different ways of app development. If you are an Apple fan and wish to develop apps for iOS, then you have to go for Swift 4 and Xcode 9 to develop apps with ARKit and CoreML. By mastering Swift 4 and Xcode 9, you can become a professional developer for the iOS platform. You can build apps for organizations and become a freelancer taking up developer jobs.

The iOs developers build robust models for the applications which are supposed to be run on the Apple systems. Through building new applications the developers modify the existing features and bring in new features, it could be extra storage space, better camera quality, etc.

The known hard skills which an iOS developer should be having are The Swift 3.0 language, Apple’s Xcode, Designing, etc. The iOS developers procure a high salary in the market. Ranging from 2.0 Lakhs to 13 Lakhs. (Source). The developers get competitive salaries and are highly in demand.

11. Node.js Developer

If you wish to build real-world network-based applications, then Node.js can be a great start. By mastering Express, MongoDB, Mocha and other such software, you will be able to develop, test and finally deploy amazing production applications in real-time.

You need to master these platforms first before you can take a turn to become a professional Node developer. Node is a vast field and you can expect to face a lot of challenges. Courses on Node.js will help you jump over these obstacles and hone your skills in Node.js.

A Node.js Developer deploys and maintains the network applications. They need to be knowing how to work with servers as they manage the servers to connect the application with different servers. Along with this, the professionals should also be having knowledge of the backend development so they could connect the servers effic

12. C++ and Unreal Engine Developer Course

If you love both coding and programming, then C++ and Unreal Engine Developer course is just for you. An Unreal Engine is a famous tool in most modern gaming and they are still known to use the popular C++. C++, like Java, is quite a basic tool used to set up the foundation for computer science students. By mastering industry-standard C++, you will be able to develop your own games using the Unreal engine. You can be a novice too and yet gain amazing expertise from this course.

A course in C++ programming combined with Unreal Engine development can significantly advance your career. Regarded as one of the best computer programming courses to choose from if you want to be a game developer, these courses empower individuals to enter the thriving gaming and simulation industry.

By enrolling in a C++ and Unreal Engine Developer Course, individuals gain comprehensive knowledge of both programming and game development. Such courses cover C++ fundamentals, object-oriented programming, memory management, Unreal Engine’s architecture, game mechanics, graphics rendering, and optimization techniques.

13. Master Jenkins

If you are interested to learn about Master Jenkins, then you should opt for a course in Master Jenkins. It will help you to understand the Jenkins build pipeline, how to set it up, continuous inspections as in building, testing and static analyses and then continuous deployment which includes staging and production. So, overall, you get quite a good look into Master Jenkins and how it works.

Opting for a course in mastering Jenkins offers a comprehensive understanding of this powerful automation tool widely used in software development. Within the Jenkins build pipeline, learners explore various stages involved in software development, including building, testing, and performing static analyses on the codebase. Understanding how to automate these processes within Jenkins ensures efficient and reliable software development practices.

By comprehensively studying Jenkins through this computer science course, individuals acquire practical knowledge and hands-on experience in orchestrating and managing the complete software delivery lifecycle. This knowledge proves invaluable in streamlining development processes, increasing efficiency, and maintaining code quality while significantly reducing manual intervention.

14. Docker Mastery

A recent trend has shown that many techies are trying to learn Docker Mastery, the complete toolset. With the right course, you can actually get deep into Docker Mastery and understand the ‘whys’ of it. You can learn docker skills easily and fast once you enroll yourself in a proper course.

Docker is nothing but online containerisation for the platform. It reduces the need for more infrastructure. This reduction in the infrastructure basically helps in reducing the cost. Docker can be used for version control on the platform.

Docker Mastery courses serve as great programming courses. They cover Docker fundamentals, container management, Dockerfile creation, Docker Compose for multi-container applications, networking, storage, security best practices, and integration with orchestration tools.

Overall, mastering Docker through a dedicated course equips individuals with the knowledge and skills needed to leverage containerization technology effectively. It enhances productivity, promotes consistency in software development practices, and opens doors to various career opportunities in the rapidly evolving landscape of software development and IT infrastructure.

15. Cyber Security Course

Most computers, mobile phones, and other such ‘smart’ devices are connected to the internet. When it comes to the internet, there is always some kind of harm – from malware and viruses to attacks from remote hackers. Learning how you can secure desktops, laptops, and smart devices against such threats as viruses, security thieves, hackers, trackers, etc., is an immensely useful tool. You can become an expert in Cybersecurity in different operating systems like macOS, Linus, iOS, Android, and Windows.

Now that everything has turned online the security for keeping the data safe is a pertinent concern. Cyber security keeps the data safe on internet-connected devices from any unforeseeable damages or theft. To keep the security intact is not an easy task and requires specially trained professionals. With the rise of the online lifestyle, the need for cyber security professionals has also increased. There are many online programming courses that provide an opportunity to educate oneself on cyber security.

16. M.Sc. in Computer Science

If you wish to research computer science in general, then it is important to go for a Ph.D. in computer science. However, you will not be allowed a Ph.D. unless you gain a Master’s in computer science. With this course, you can get a PG Diploma in Full Stack Development or a PG Diploma in Software Development, Blockchain.

For the Master’s degree, you will be introduced to different research topics and understand different research methodologies which will adequately prepare you for our Ph.D. level studies. You may have to present a dissertation at the end of this course as well.

Pursuing a Master’s in Computer Science is a smart move in this current time and the same was predicted by the Bureau of Labour Statistics (BLS) which predicted the 11% job growth in computer and information technology occupations over the next 10 years. Also if someone is already in the computer science industry and seeing stagnation in their job promotion should definitely go ahead and pursue masters. As the MSc. in Computer Science will open job opportunities for them at the higher hierarchy,

17. PG Diploma in Software Development Specialisation in Blockchain

Blockchain development is slowly gaining a lot of pace in the tech world. However, it is important to integrate the growing blockchain technology with the right software so that companies and organizations could use them and fit it into their system. Hence, software developers dealing with blockchain are in high demand.

In this course, you will learn the basics of Object-Oriented Programming, algorithms, and data Structure. Along with that, you will start learning about software engineering frameworks and server-side development. Finally, you will be entering into blockchain development in JavaScript, Ethereum, and Hyperledger.

The blockchain domain is expected to grow at a CAGR of 33.4%. And is expected to reach US$ 55.2 Bn by 2032. (Source). Some of the hard skills which are required for blockchain are-

Cryptography

Data Structures

Smart Contracts

Programming Language

Security

Network

There are many job roles that are available in the blockchain industry, such as-

Blockchain Developer

Blockchain Project Manager

Blockchain Solution Architect

Blockchain UX Designer

Blockchain Legal Consultant

Today blockchain is seeing a rapid demand so it is advisable to pursue a career in blockchain without any delay. Today there are many options to learn programming online and blockchain courses are no behind.

18. Executive Program in Blockchain Technology Management

Just learning about blockchain technology is not always enough. It is important to use blockchain in a way that will be beneficial to the organization. That is where Blockchain Technology Management comes.

For managing blockchain technology, you do not only need to learn about blockchain technology but you should also possess planning skills, qualitative analytical skills and other decision-making power regarding blockchain network. In this course, you will be learning about the blockchain networks and architecture, blockchain delivery systems and Blockchain future prospects as well.

Overall, an Executive Program in Blockchain Technology Management equips executives with the knowledge, skills, and strategic insights needed to lead blockchain initiatives, drive digital transformation, and leverage the potential of blockchain technology for business growth and innovation.

19. Master of Science in Data Science

Big Data analysis runs simultaneously with data science and machine learning. The combination of these three is shaping the world and preparing it for a new future. Data scientists are often required by big tech companies to examine data, both structured and unstructured, to derive insight from it.

If you enter a course of Data Science, you will have to deal with machine learning, business analytics, Data engineering, business intelligence and Natural Language Processing. A capable data scientist with relevant certificates and skills backing them up can make a great mark in the world of modern technology.

The Data Science market is expected to grow to $79.7 billion by 2030, witnessing a CAGR of 33.6% from 2021 to 2030. (Source). The following hard skills are the most required as a data scientist.

Statistics

Programming

Coding

Predictive Modelling

Data visualisation

Deployment

Today there are many options to learn and educate oneself. upGrad’s MSDS comes under one of the best computer programming courses.

Featured program for you Master’s Degree in Data Science from LJMU

20. PG Diploma in Machine Learning and AI

Since more and more homes are getting intelligent devices like Alexa and Google Home, Machine Learning and AI are becoming more and more relevant. Machine Learning is a way in which machines can learn from previous data or repeated data and act accordingly.

It is quite an evolution in the world of machines and includes introducing learning patterns in machines through the use of prior programming. Alexa’s recommendations based on previous recommendations could be a good example of machine learning. It is clear that machine learning has become quite important in the modern world.

This course on machine learning covers a wide range of topics which include in-depth machine learning and deep learning, use of statistics and exploratory data analytics, reinforcement learning and deployment projects. Overall, with the help of this course, you can develop your machine learning capability well.

21. Advanced Certificate Programme in Machine Learning – IIT Delhi

Here’s another Machine Learning program on upGrad offered by IIT Delhi, one of the most prestigious and premier institutes in India. The course is designed for freshers, mid-level managers, and senior executives so they can learn to be industry leaders. The 7-month course requires students to take a 40 minute entrance test on programming and mathematics; the resulting test score forms the basis of their being shortlisted. Anyone with a bachelor’s degree in engineering or computer science is eligible to apply for the course.

There are 20 live sessions included across the 30-week IIT Delhi program that covers 16 data science subjects taught by world-class IITD faculty to help students build ML capabilities and lead functional teams.
